During oil change kid finds GPS tracking device installed by FBI[2]

Could Ring's video doorbell help cut down on crime?[6]
Ethical hacker shows us how easily smart devices can be hacked and give access to your personal info[7]
How Hackers Compromise Ring Cameras and Other Online Devices[8]
Mississippi Police Tap Ring Doorbells[9]
How easy is it to capture data on public free Wi-Fi?[10]
WiFi Deauthing (disconnect everyone from WIFI, and capture WIFI passwords as they reconnect.)[11]
Detecting WiFi Hacks[12]
Intercept Images from a Security Camera Using Wireshark[13]
Hacking demo (view desktop and activate camera example)[14]

Yellow Dots of Mystery: Is Your Printer Spying on You?[16]

Living in a surveillance state: Mikko Hypponen[20]

Your smartphone is leaking your information by Bram Bonné[23]
The end of privacy, The Data Brokers: Selling your personal information[24]
How data brokers sold my identity by Madhumita Murgia[25]
